meanings.definition: A shop where sweets are sold.
meanings.sent1: I visited the sweetshops to buy some candies for my friends.
meanings.sent2: The sweetshops in town always have a variety of delicious treats.
meanings.sent3: The sweetshops were so tempting that I ended up buying more than I planned.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as the candies in the sweetshops.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sweetshops lingered in the air, drawing in customers from afar.

meanings.sent1: The sweetshops' owner enjoyed the art of sweet selling.
meanings.sent2: She made a profit from the sweetshops' successful sweet selling.
meanings.sent3: The sweetshops' sweet selling skills were unmatched in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His sweet selling techniques were as smooth as the candies in the sweetshops.
meanings.sent5: The sweetshops' sweet selling was so popular that they ran out of stock quickly.
